docs.snippet: A shocking murder was committed on Saturday last at the village of White Church, C. W., near Toronto. The name of the victim is Robert Ramsay. a respectable, well?? do farmer, about 60 years of age. The murderer, Wm. Iloghie is also a man advanced in...
docs.lead_paragraph: A shocking murder was committed on Saturday last at the village of White Church, C. W., near Toronto. The name of the victim is Robert Ramsay. a respectable, well?? do farmer, about 60 years of age. The murderer, Wm. Iloghie is also a man advanced in life, being apparently between 50 and 60. They had married sisters and a feeling of jealously seems to have sprung up between them.

docs.snippet: The Paris correspondent of the Boston Journal communicates the following, under date of Jan. 6. respecting Senator Sumner: "A letter received yesterday from Mr. Sumner gives but little encouragement for his speedy recovery to his numerous friends....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Paris correspondent of the Boston Journal communicates the following, under date of Jan. 6. respecting Senator Sumner: "A letter received yesterday from Mr. Sumner gives but little encouragement for his speedy recovery to his numerous friends. The fact of his still being in the South of France is the best indication of his health. He will get away from France and Europe as soon as it is possible.

headline.main: Venezuela.; ARRIVAL OF GENERAL PAEZ--REMOVAL OF THE CAPITAL OF CARACAS--THE AMERICAN CONSUL AT LAGUAYRA.

docs.lead_paragraph: General PAEZ arrived at Puerto Cabello on the 4th inst., direct from Cumana, and left the next day for valencia, still unable to walk, in consequence of the accident with which he met in New-York previous to his departure. Otherwise his health is excellent, and he has on all occasions expressed himself deeply grateful to the people and authorities of the United States, which he loves as dearly as his own country.

docs.snippet: The Committee reported against the bill to limit the tenure of commissions in the militia, on the ground that it conflicts with the Constitution. BILLS PASSED. To incorporate the New-York German savings Bank. To facilitate the formation of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Committee reported against the bill to limit the tenure of commissions in the militia, on the ground that it conflicts with the Constitution. BILLS PASSED. To incorporate the New-York German savings Bank. To facilitate the formation of Agricultural Societies. Regulating the theatres in New-York, by prohibiting the admission of boys when unaccompanied.

docs.snippet: THE SEVENTH REGIMENT AT WOOD'S GYMNASIUM, --The members of Wood's Gymnasium, Nos. 4 and 6 East Twenty-eighth -street, gave a compliment-ary exhibition last evening in honor of the Seventh Regiment,. (National Guard,) to which many of them are...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE SEVENTH REGIMENT AT WOOD'S GYMNASIUM, --The members of Wood's Gymnasium, Nos. 4 and 6 East Twenty-eighth -street, gave a compliment-ary exhibition last evening in honor of the Seventh Regiment,. (National Guard,) to which many of them are attached. That portion of the Gymnasium which was set part for spectators was crowded by an audience, many of whom were military men.

docs.snippet: THE NEW JERSEY STATE MEDICAL SOCIETY.Dr. A. K. GARDNER, of New-York City, by special invitation, read a paper before the Society, (the State Medical,) on Monday evening last, on intra-uterine diseases and their treatment. Dr. G. stated that the...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE NEW JERSEY STATE MEDICAL SOCIETY.Dr. A. K. GARDNER, of New-York City, by special invitation, read a paper before the Society, (the State Medical,) on Monday evening last, on intra-uterine diseases and their treatment. Dr. G. stated that the knowledge of the diseases of the womb was of modern origin, and that not till 1845 was there any great appreciation of their importance as affecting the general health.

docs.snippet: Sir Charles Coldstream, in need of a new Sensation, should have visited this City, in which excitements and sensations appear to be part of the natural atmosphere. Oxygen and rumors ; hydrogen and curious developments ; nitrogen and astounding facts;...

headline.main: WASHINGTON SOCIETY.; Sketches and Glimpses of Men and Things, including Women, at the Capital.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sir Charles Coldstream, in need of a new Sensation, should have visited this City, in which excitements and sensations appear to be part of the natural atmosphere. Oxygen and rumors ; hydrogen and curious developments ; nitrogen and astounding facts; carbonic and all other chemical gases, with a liberal infusion of those political and social exhalations in which idle people of leisure and ample means do most voraciously delight.

headline.main: The City Inspectorship--Eulogy on the Character and Services of Mr. Morton.

docs.snippet: A regular meeting of this Board was held last evening. After the usual preliminary business had been disposed of, under the special order, the matter of supplying the City with stationery was called up. After considerable talk, the reports on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: A regular meeting of this Board was held last evening. After the usual preliminary business had been disposed of, under the special order, the matter of supplying the City with stationery was called up. After considerable talk, the reports on the subject, with the affidavit of NATHAN LANE, and communication of Commissioner of Repairs and Supplies, were ordered printed.
